tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ShippingRoutes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    origin_location GEOMETRY,
    destination_location GEOMETRY,
    distance_km FLOAT,
    estimated_time_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE shipments (
  shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  shipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  weight_kg FLOAT,
  destination GEOMETRY(POINT),
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_point POINT,
  end_point POINT,
  distance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  coordinates POINT
)

CREATE TABLE shipments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  shipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_location_id INT,
  end_location_id INT,
  distance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_name VARCHAR(255),
  capacity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE shipping_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(255),
  route_geom GEOGRAPHY,
  distance FLOAT,
  CONSTRAINT chk_distance CHECK (distance >= 0)
);

CREATE TABLE route_stops (
  stop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  destination_id INT,
  stop_order INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_route FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES shipping_routes(route_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_destination FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES shipping_destinations(destination_id)
);

CREATE TABLE route_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_route_schedule FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES shipping_routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE route_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  update_time TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_route_history FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES shipping_routes(route_id)
);
